data.ques: What is the voter turnout in Bangalore South constituency in the 2018 Karnataka Assembly Elections?
data.ans: Voter turnout in Bangalore South constituency during the 2018 Karnataka Assembly Elections: 54.01%

data.ques: What were the criminal records of the major candidates contesting from Bangalore South constituency in the 2018 Karnataka Assembly Elections?
data.ans:
According to data provided by the Association for Democratic Reforms (ADR), some of the major candidates contesting from Bangalore South constituency in the 2018 Karnataka Assembly Elections had criminal cases registered against them. For example, Ravi Subramanya (BJP) had three criminal cases registered against him, while M. Krishnappa (INC) had seven criminal cases registered against him.

Criminal records of major candidates contesting from Bangalore South constituency during the 2018 Karnataka Assembly Elections:

  • Ravi Subramanya (BJP) - 3 criminal cases registered
  • M. Krishnappa (INC) - 7 criminal cases registered
